languages.text: {n}Ящик задерживает бумагу дольше обычного. Когда лист показывается из прорези, он явственно дрожит. Вы видите надпись "СОЖЖЕНИЕ. НЕ НАДО".{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ящик задерживает бумагу дольше обычного. Когда лист показывается из прорези, он явственно дрожит. Вы видите надпись "СОЖЖЕНИЕ. НЕ НАДО".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The box holds the paper longer than usual. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. DON'T."{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper longer than usual. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. DON'T."{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper longer than usual. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. DON'T."{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper longer than usual. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. DON'T."{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}
{n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

languages.text: {n}纸张卡在了箱子里，很久都没有反应。当纸张终于再次吐出来的时候，箱子明显地颤动起来。你看到纸上写着“火刑，饶命”这几个字。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纸张卡在了箱子里，很久都没有反应。当纸张终于再次吐出来的时候，箱子明显地颤动起来。你看到纸上写着“火刑，饶命”这几个字。{/n}

languages.text: {n}箱は長い間紙を吐き出さなかった。ようやくスロットから紙が出てくると、それは明らかに震えていた。そこにはこう書かれていた。「焼却。どうかやめてください」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}箱は長い間紙を吐き出さなかった。ようやくスロットから紙が出てくると、それは明らかに震えていた。そこにはこう書かれていた。「焼却。どうかやめてください」{/n}

languages.text: {n}La caja retiene la hoja de papel en su interior durante un largo rato. Cuando al fin asoma por la ranura, está temblando visiblemente. Ves escritas en ella las palabras «INMOLACIÓN. POR FAVOR, NO».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La caja retiene la hoja de papel en su interior durante un largo rato. Cuando al fin asoma por la ranura, está temblando visiblemente. Ves escritas en ella las palabras «INMOLACIÓN. POR FAVOR, NO».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kutu, kâğıdı uzun bir süre tutuyor. Kâğıt nihayet delikten çıktığında gözle görülür şekilde titriyor. Üzerinde "YAKILMA. LÜTFEN YAPMAYIN." sözcüklerini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kutu, kâğıdı uzun bir süre tutuyor. Kâğıt nihayet delikten çıktığında gözle görülür şekilde titriyor. Üzerinde "YAKILMA. LÜTFEN YAPMAYIN." sözcüklerini görüyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La caisse conserve la feuille un long moment. Quand elle émerge enfin de la fente, vous remarquez qu'elle tremble étrangement. Vous pouvez y lire les mots : « IMMOLATION. ÉPARGNEZ-MOI ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La caisse conserve la feuille un long moment. Quand elle émerge enfin de la fente, vous remarquez qu'elle tremble étrangement. Vous pouvez y lire les mots : « IMMOLATION. ÉPARGNEZ-MOI ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Blatt bleibt sehr lange in der Kiste. Als es schließlich ausgeworfen wird, zittert es merklich. Du siehst die Worte "OPFER. TUT ES BITTE NICHT."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The box holds the paper for a long time. When the sheet finally emerges from the slot, it is visibly shaking. You see the words "IMMOLATION. PLEASE DON'T."{/n}
